titles.title: For the relief of the estate of Wallace B. Sawyer, Jr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to the estate of a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising from his death as a crewmember of an airplane that was hit in a missile attack.
